newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares seen flat or down on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares seen flat or down on Wednesday.

text.p: Polish shares were seen flat or down on Wednesday after recent gains, signalled by Tuesday's strong selling after price-fixing followed by a slight gain by the WIG 20 index in continuous trade.
Some analysts said a fall could represent a brief downward correction, with the market mood kept good by March's better company earnings and good inflation data released last week.
Others said this week's heavy primary market schedule, including the 222-million-zloty offer by metals trader and producer Impexmetal, would draw cash from stocks.
Jutrzenka transfers to the main market from the parallel floor on Wednesday. -- Steven Silber +48 22 653 9700
